name: Presto
short_description:
A mod_perl-based RPC API designed for ease of setup, ease of extension, and rapid development.

Using Presto, you can develop a robust, fully "web-2.0" web application in a day or two.

Oh and it scales.

Take that, Ruby on Rails.
